remarks: The inverse transformation applied to the transformation of a matrix over a ring R results in the matrix itself.  (Contributed by AV, 12-Nov-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 13-Dec-2019.)
statement:
m2cpminvid.i $e |- I = ( N cPolyMatToMat R ) $.
m2cpminvid.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
m2cpminvid.k $e |- K = ( Base ` A ) $.
m2cpminvid.t $e |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) $.
m2cpminvid $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. K ) -> ( I ` ( T ` M ) ) = M ) $.
